mapper.select:
select r.* from( select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from reviews where product_no = #{boardNo} order by rdate desc) a
where rownum <= (#{rpage} * 4)) r
where r.rn > (#{rpage} -1) * 4
mapper.insert:
select reviews_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reviews (review_no, user_id, product_no, content, rating) values (#{reviewNo}, #{userId}, #{productNo}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.update: update products p set rating = ( select nvl(avg(r.rating), 0) from reviews r where r.product_no = p.product_no ) where exists ( select 1 from reviews r where r.product_no = p.product_no )
